item.description:
Happy Holidays Everyone!

It's that time of year where we get together with friends, family and food! This year you should add photography to that line up. We will be having our annual holiday party! This year we are meeting at the Park Hill Gallery on Park Ave Worcester MA. Please bring one food item to share. And feel free to bring a significant other or friend to the party!

Also, We will be having a photo swap! We hope you will participate! Please take one of your photos. Matt it - sign it - wrap it! It will be placed on a pile with others and all who participate will have their name included in a hat. Names will be drawn and you can pick a print. It's fun! We encourage you to participate.

Hope you can all make it. Please RSVP so we know how many cups, plates etc, to bring.


Can't wait to see you all again!

Cheers,
Donna and Scotty

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography December Meetup- Holiday Party
